Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was reduced to a 10-over contest due to rain.
Others: Scotland made 90/0 in a rain-shortened 10-over innings, but the game was abandoned.
England's batters required 109 to win, but the rain returned before they could begin their chase.
Scotland's George Munsey unfurled a remarkable reverse hit off Adil Rashid to send the ball into the stands in the rain-shortened game against England.
England have never beaten a European side at a Menâ€™s T20 World Cup, and the rain ensured that record continued in Barbados.
Scotland will be rueing a missed opportunity to defend their decent total, and will hope to get a win on the board when they face Namibia on Thursday.
